abstract: Goodyear Tire and Rubber reports third-quarter profit of $161 million, or 60 cents per share, compared with loss of $20 million, or 8 cents per share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $6.1 billion, up 22 percent from $5 billion.
snippet: Revenue rose 22 percent as the strategy of promoting high-end tires paid off even as the number of tires sold was unchanged.
lead_paragraph: Revenue rose 22 percent as the strategy of promoting high-end tires paid off even as the number of tires sold was unchanged.

headline.main: Goodyear Finds Profit From Its Highest Revenue Ever
headline.print_headline: Goodyear Finds Profit From Its Highest Revenue Ever
headline.seo: Goodyear Finds Profit From Highest Revenue Ever
